summary.span: 为监视跟踪和调试输出的侦听器提供 基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for the listeners who monitor trace and debug output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何实现的示例, 请参见和类。For examples of how to implement a , see the , and the classes. 您必须启用跟踪或调试才能使用跟踪侦听器。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a trace listener. 以下语法是编译器特定的。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果使用C#或 Visual Basic 以外的编译器, 请参阅编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要在中C#启用调试, `/d:DEBUG`请在编译代码时将标志添加到编译器命令行, 或者将添加`#define DEBUG`到文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中, 将`/d:DEBUG=True`标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要在中C#启用跟踪, `/d:TRACE`请在编译代码时将标志添加到编译器命令行, 或`#define TRACE`将添加到文件的顶部。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中, 将`/d:TRACE=True`标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. 若要添加跟踪侦听器, 请编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To add a trace listener, edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中, 您可以添加一个侦听器, 设置其类型并设置其参数, 删除侦听器, 或者清除之前由应用程序设置的所有侦听器。Within this file, you can add a listener, set its type and set its parameter, remove a listener, or clear all the listeners previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应与下面的示例类似。The configuration file should be formatted similar to the following example. ```xml ``` 有关使用配置文件进行跟踪的详细信息, 请[ <参阅 "诊断>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md)"。For more information on using configuration files for tracing, see [<system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md).

span.span: This type is thread safe.

para.span: 从此类继承以实现和类的自定义侦听器。

span.span: Inherit from this class to implement a custom listener for the and classes.
At a minimum, you must implement the and methods.

para.span: 此外, 您还可以实现、 和方法。

span.span: Additionally, you can implement the , and methods.

summary.span: 获取应用程序配置文件中定义的自定义跟踪侦听器特性。

span.span: Gets the custom trace listener attributes defined in the application configuration file.

value.span: 包含自定义跟踪侦听器特性的 。

span.span: A containing the custom attributes for the trace listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从类继承的类可以通过重写方法并返回自定义属性名称的字符串数组, 来添加自定义特性。Classes that inherit from the class can add custom attributes by overriding the method and returning a string array of custom attribute names. 属性标识在应用程序的配置文件中引用的自定义特性。The property identifies the custom attributes that are referenced in the application's configuration file. 例如, 在下面的配置文件中, 引用了自定义属性 "分隔符"。For example, in the following configuration file excerpt the custom attribute "delimiter" is referenced. 在这种情况下 , 属性将返回包含字符串 "分隔符" 的。In this case, the property returns a containing the string "delimiter". ```xml ``` 未引用的自定义特性不会被枚举。Unreferenced custom attributes are not enumerated. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method.

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，关闭输出流以使它不再接收跟踪或调试输出。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, closes the output stream so it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在输出转到文件 (例如) 时使用此方法。Use this method when the output is going to a file, such as to the . 调用此方法后, 必须重新初始化该对象。After a call to this method, you must reinitialize the object.

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用会允许出于其他目的重新分配所使用的资源。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

span.span: Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共方法和方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose`调用受保护的方法, `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。`Dispose` invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在`Dispose` 设置`disposing` 为`false`的情况调用。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写此方法时, 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding this method, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息, 请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置跟踪侦听器的跟踪筛选器。

span.span: Gets or sets the trace filter for the trace listener.

value.span: 一个派生自 基类的对象。

span.span: An object derived from the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪筛选器可以添加到跟踪侦听器, 以提供通过开关提供给跟踪源的筛选层。A trace filter can be added to a trace listener to provide a layer of screening beyond that provided to the trace source by switches. 例如, 可以将添加到跟踪侦听器, 以控制侦听器输出的事件类型。For example, the can be added to a trace listener to control the event types that are output by the listener. 由于满足交换机条件, 而调用的侦听器可以查询其筛选器 (如果有), 以确定是否要将跟踪发送到输出。Listeners that are called because the switch criteria are met can query their filter, if present, to determine if a trace is to be sent to output. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性向控制台跟踪侦听器添加源筛选器。The following code example shows how to use the property to add a source filter to a console trace listener. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#28)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#28)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示跟踪侦听器是否是线程安全的。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the trace listener is thread safe.

value.span: 如果跟踪侦听器是线程安全的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the trace listener is thread safe; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值用于确定在写入侦听器时是否使用全局锁。The value of is used to determine whether to use a global lock when writing to the listener. 如果的值为`false`, 则使用全局锁, 而不考虑的值。If the value of is `false`, the global lock is used regardless of the value of . 仅当的值为`true` , 并且的值为时`false`, 才使用全局锁。The global lock is not used only if the value of is `true` and the value of is `false`. 默认行为是在写入侦听器时使用全局锁。The default behavior is to use the global lock whenever writing to the listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **注意** `false`由和类调用的方法将属性值设置为,以防止以后不必要的缩进。 **Note** The method, called by the and classes, sets the property value to `false` to prevent later, unnecessary indents. 必须将属性设置为`true`每次要缩进跟踪输出。You must set the property to `true` each time you wish to indent trace output.

summary.span: 向特定于侦听器的输出中写入跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object and event information to the listener specific output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用, 而是由、 和类的成员直接调用以将跟踪数据写入输出。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 默认实现在跟踪的`eventCache`标头`eventType`和`id`脚注中写入、 `source`和参数。The default implementation writes the `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType` and `id` parameters in the header and footer of the trace. 该`data`参数将写入为跟踪消息的正文。The `data` parameter is written as the body of the trace message. 数据对象的方法用于将`ToString`对象转换为。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a .

summary.span: 向特定于侦听器的输出中写入跟踪信息、数据对象的数组和事件信息。

span.span: Writes trace information, an array of data objects and event information to the listener specific output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用, 而是由、 和类的成员直接调用以将跟踪数据写入输出。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 默认实现将`source`、 `eventType`和`id`参数的值写入标头。The default implementation writes the values of the `source`, `eventType` and `id` parameters as a header. 数据对象使用每个对象的`ToString`方法转换为字符串。The data objects are converted to strings using the `ToString` method of each object. 数据以页脚形式写入, 输出数据的性质依赖于属性的值。 `eventCache`The `eventCache` data is written as a footer, the nature of the output data being dependent on the value of the property.

summary.span: 向特定于侦听器的输出写入跟踪和事件信息。

span.span: Writes trace and event information to the listener specific output.

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects and event information to the listener specific output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用, 而是由、 和类的成员直接调用以将跟踪数据写入输出。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 默认实现将`source`、 `eventType`和`id`参数的值写入标头。The default implementation writes the values of the `source`, `eventType` and `id` parameters as a header. 使用方法将`format` 对象数组`args`转换为字符串, 传递字符串和数组以将字符串格式化为跟踪的消息部分。 `args` The `args` object array is converted to a string using the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array to format the string as the message portion of the trace. 数据以页脚形式写入, 输出数据的性质依赖于属性的值。 `eventCache`The `eventCache` data is written as a footer, the nature of the output data being dependent on the value of the property.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置跟踪输出选项。

span.span: Gets or sets the trace output options.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定跟踪输出的可选内容。The property determines the optional content of trace output. 属性可以在配置文件中设置, 也可以在执行过程中以编程方式进行设置, 以包括专门针对一段代码的额外数据。The property can be set in the configuration file or programmatically during execution to include additional data specifically for a section of code. 例如, 可以将控制台跟踪侦听器的属性设置为 , 以将调用堆栈信息添加到跟踪输出。For example, you can set the property for the console trace listener to to add call stack information to the trace output. 下面的类和方法不使用枚举:The enumeration is not used by the following classes and methods: - 类, 因为它可能会导致大量数据写入日志。The class, because it can cause a large volume of data to be written to the log. - `WriteLine` 、和类的和方法。 `Write` The `Write` and `WriteLine` methods of the , , and classes. - 如果未在派生类中重写,则为类的和方法。The and methods of the class when they are not overridden in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了控制台跟踪侦听器的属性的设置。The following example shows the setting of the property for a console trace listener. 控制台跟踪侦听器是跟踪源的属性中枚举的侦听器之一。The console trace listener is one of the listeners enumerated in the property of a trace source. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#16)]

exception.span: Set 操作失败，因为值无效。

span.span: Set operation failed because the value is invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用, 而是由、 和类的成员直接调用以将跟踪数据写入输出。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 方法用于关联相关跟踪。The method is used for the correlation of related traces. `relatedActivityId` 方法调用方法来处理调用, 并将 "设置为" 级别设置为并将设置为附加到消息的字符串。 The method calls the method to process the call, with the eventType level set to and the `relatedActivityId` as a string appended to the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法写入缩进, 并将属性重`false`置为。This method writes the indent and resets the property to `false`. 如果 要`true`重写 和方法, 请调用此方法。Call this method if is `true` when you are overriding the and methods. 默认情况下, 此方法使用空格进行缩进。By default, this method uses blank spaces for indentation. 缩进大小取决于和属性的值。The size of the indent is determined by the values of the and properties. 属性表示应用属性指定的大小的缩进次数。 The property represents the number of times the indent of the size specified by the property is applied. 此方法由和类调用。This method is called by the and classes.
